docs.text: Welcome to the homepage of Weitian Xing I am currently a 2nd-term MASc (Master of Applied Science) student in the department of Electrical and Computer Engineering at University of Waterloo , my advisor is Prof. Werner Dietl . Before that, I received my B.S. in Electronic Information Science and Technology from Nanjing University of Posts and Telecommunications . My Chinese name is 邢维天(Xing Weitian). Click here to hear the pronunciation of my first name. I am a member of the Programming Language Group (PLG) at UW. I write a tool to make adding fund to watcard easy: fund-my-watcard . Find me at: Github | Linkedin | Devpost News Teaching assistant of SE 350: Operating System (Winter 2020) . Research Interests I am currently working on pluggable type systems based on Checker Framework . Industry Experiences Apr 2018 - Jun 2018: Python R&D Engineer Intern at Nanjing Guiji Zhineng Technology . Oct 2017 - Jan 2018: Backend Developer Intern at Nanjing Walkyren Network Technology. Courses Fall 2018. ECE 606. Algorithm Design and Analysis. Fall 2018. ECE 650. Methods and Tools for Software Engineering. Winter 2019. ECE 651. Foundations of Software Engineering. [ Project ] Winter 2019. ECE 656. Database Systems. [ Project ] Winter 2019. CS 654. Distributed Systems. [ Project ] [ Report ] Srping 2019. ECE 653. Software Testing, Quality Assurance, and Maintenance. Spring 2019. ECE 654. Software Reliability Engineering. [ Presentation ] Teaching My teaching experience: Teaching assistant of SE 464: Software Architecture and Design (Fall 2019) . Hackathon I enjoy attending hackathon with my friends: Hacker at Hack the North 2019 . Our project: Dr Dash . Hacker at StarterHacks 2019 . Our project: Wish Wellness . Contact Me Click here to see the contact information.
